description:
Trever is one of those enigma-type guys. He seems shy and quiet and even stumbles a bit over his words, but the boy likes to party. And when I asked him if he was shy, he was like, "No way!"
He didn't have a preference as to what kind of porn to watch. For the photos, he watched straight stuff, and he was one of those guys whose dick sprung to life the more it got exposed. (Ok, so maybe he isn't so shy after all!)
For the video, I put on a guy-guy video, and he seemed just as happy to watch that one to keep himself going. He also enjoyed playing to the camera and getting you to want his dick.
He is a quiet one though, so turn your volume up high.
Nice cumshot and, frankly, I think he is adorable. With his no-muss no-fuss attitude toward sex, he seems like he would be a versatile player as part of Team Chaos!
title: Trever - Solo
